descriptions.finished: The decks are clean enough to eat off of. Great job!
descriptions.started: The decks need a good swabbing matey. Let's get to it.

descriptions.finished: That was hard work, but it's worth it.
descriptions.started: This cargo needs loading. Let's put our backs into it mate!

descriptions.finished: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: We need wood to make stuff. Let's get to chopping swabby!

descriptions.finished: Good job matey! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: The cotton is ready to harvest.

descriptions.finished: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: Let's scuttle that ore you scallywag.

descriptions.finished: Those are the Mermaid Scales we were looking for. Great work!
descriptions.started: Use nets to drag the waters for lost booty. We might find Mermaid Scales if we're lucky.

descriptions.finished: That smugglers Compass will come in handy. Well done!
descriptions.started: Those dirty smugglers stay in the shallows. Use the oars to chase them down!

descriptions.finished: That is a fancy Spyglass you found. We should be able to put that to good use.
descriptions.started: Traders see us on the horizon a flee. If we anchor in the mists just out of port, they will never see us coming.

descriptions.finished: Calm seas and we found some treasure to boot!
descriptions.started: Hammer-Dead sharks are attacking ships in this area. Use the Spyglass to avoid a run in with those beasties.

descriptions.finished: Thanks to Mecha-Flipper we have some new shinies!
descriptions.started: Robo-Dolphins will lead old salty dogs to treasure. Let's see if we can tail one to some goods.

descriptions.finished: Once we were inside the town was ripe for the picking.
descriptions.started: Let's bribe a landlubber guard with a Mermaid scale and sneak into their town.

descriptions.finished: Back to the deep with those ones!
descriptions.started: These slimy bilge rats are scaring off the traders. Time to send them to see Davy Jones!

descriptions.finished: Well done matey!
descriptions.started: That Djinn took our rum! After it!!

descriptions.finished: This booty is worth more than a peanut.
descriptions.started: Inconceivable...

descriptions.finished: Arr, that beast was tough! Good job driving it off mate.
descriptions.started: There she blows, the White Mecha-Whale!

descriptions.finished: That was a rough storm, but it brought some good to our shores.
descriptions.started: Batten down the hatches, there's a mighty squall coming!

descriptions.finished: That should teach those scaly sea rats a lesson!
descriptions.started: Tritons fury is upon us! To arms!!

18.name: Find the Lost Isle of Gold

descriptions.finished: Well done and raise those cups! We found riches fit for a true Pirate Lord!
descriptions.started: We found a map to the lost Island of Gold! Let's set sail!

descriptions.finished: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: We need wood to make stuff. Let's get to chopping swabby!

descriptions.finished: Good job matey! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: The cotton is ready to harvest.

descriptions.finished: Good job! Let's put that in the hold for use later.
descriptions.started: Let's scuttle that ore you scallywag.

descriptions.finished: I couldn't look...did we win?
descriptions.started: Feeling lucky? Ante up and roll those bones for a chance at winning big!

descriptions.finished: That's a shiny prize mate. Well done!
descriptions.started: We're hunting a trade ship. Let's hope they have a heavy cargo.

descriptions.finished: That was a valuable lesson.
descriptions.started: Let's review the basics and get this pirate some valuable experience.

descriptions.finished: More goods for the holds mate!
descriptions.started: We must get a Musket. See what I did there?

descriptions.finished: Another successful adventure.
descriptions.started: When negotiating, nothing helps make your point like a Dagger.

descriptions.finished: This stash will look good in our vaults.
descriptions.started: Cutlass, no mate, cut more!

descriptions.finished: More loot for the lads and lasses!
descriptions.started: Let's see if we can locate our old friend Billy Club

descriptions.finished: A fine bounty matey!
descriptions.started: A Grappling Hook is like a key for high windows.

descriptions.finished: So many old crates of fruit. At least we found some good shinies amongst that mess.
descriptions.started: Legend has it that a monkey became a Pirate Captain, and this map leads to his bounty.

descriptions.finished: The wreckage looked mighty odd, like something burst the hull from the inside. Oh well, let's be off with this treasure now.
descriptions.started: We have located a shipwreck on a small island. The sails have a goldfish on them...

descriptions.finished: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?
descriptions.started: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Sloop.

descriptions.finished: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?
descriptions.started: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Galleon.

descriptions.finished: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?
descriptions.started: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any ship plans in stock.

descriptions.finished: That's the first half of the Skiff plan found!
descriptions.started: A Skiff might be a simple ship, but it will get us on the waters. Let's find those plans!

descriptions.finished: We found the second half of the Skiff plan!
descriptions.started: Let's find the second part of the Skiff plan matey!

descriptions.finished: Did we get the Bandana? We will need it to look really cool on our quest!
descriptions.started: The seas have grown angry. We need to find someone that can help restore balance.

descriptions.finished: Did we get the Sextant? It's critical to help us find hidden routes while out at sea.
descriptions.started: We need to locate a device to help guide us on our journey.

descriptions.finished: We will need to keep bugging the King until he makes things right again.
descriptions.started: Time to find the Merfolk King and get him to sort out this mess.

descriptions.finished: Good going. A proper pirate deserves a proper vessel.
descriptions.started: Let's disassemble this skiff and make a real ship for ourselves.

descriptions.finished: That’s some Skiff.
descriptions.started: It’s just a Skiff, how tough could it be?

descriptions.finished: That Sloop got sloppy.
descriptions.started: Let’s give this Sloop the slip.

descriptions.finished: We showed those Raiders who's boss.
descriptions.started: It’ll take more than a rogue’s gallery to stop us, eh mate?

descriptions.finished: How did it go? Did they have what you were looking for?
descriptions.started: Try visiting the ship builder to see if they have any plans for a Frigate.

descriptions.finished: Not much of a pirate, says I.
descriptions.started: What's a pirate without his fancies, I ask ye?

descriptions.finished: I can't make neither heads nor tails of it.
descriptions.started: It's a toss up.

descriptions.finished: ...and they also make great centerpieces.
descriptions.started: Dead men tell no tales..

descriptions.finished: Nothing gained?
descriptions.started: Nothing ventured..

descriptions.finished: Looks just like the original... don't it?
descriptions.started: Spose it weren't too smart to pillage a magical totem, eh? If we return this one mayhaps the curse will be lifted and we'll finally see some fair winds.

descriptions.finished: So why do they call it Parrot's Perch?
descriptions.started: I've yet to see a single Parrot perch there.

descriptions.finished: You are Gen 0.
descriptions.started: Just a little science experiment.

descriptions.finished: You are Gen 1.
descriptions.started: Just a little science experiment.

descriptions.finished: A'Sailin' we will go!
descriptions.started: A Skiff might be a simple ship, but it will get us on the waters.

descriptions.finished: The gods are watching...
descriptions.started: Who favors us today?

descriptions.finished: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?
descriptions.started: The Brothers of Broseph bring a bevy of bountiful bonuses.

descriptions.finished: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?
descriptions.started: It wasn't in the cards this time.

descriptions.finished: Who knows where the god's favor will fall next time?
descriptions.started: Gah. Swabs, the lot of 'em.

descriptions.finished: What do we do with this?

descriptions.finished: What new fate have we been dealt?

descriptions.finished: I fold.
descriptions.started: A tempting offer...

descriptions.finished: Keep the party going in my absence.
descriptions.started: A tempting offer...

descriptions.finished: Bay Leaves add more flavor anyhow.

descriptions.finished: There, that should do the trick.
descriptions.started: Lady Luck seems more generous.

descriptions.finished: There, that should do the trick.
descriptions.started: Anchors aweigh! Salvation awaits across the deep blue sea.
